description:
My place is close to Union Pool, Williamsburg Cinemas, Variety Cafe, Maison Premiere, and Fette Sau. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the location, the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

No smoking.
Not suitable for pets.
No parties or events.

Large furnished studio apartment with one full-size bed. Comes with air conditioning. The apartment is a 15-minute commute to the Manhattan and there are hundreds of amazing local bars, restaurants and music venues within walking distance of the apartment.

Rooftop access.

I may be able to help and my super will be available for most hours of the day.

The apartment is close to L Train at Graham, as well as the JM lines at Hewes.
name: Spacious, safe, light apartment in Williamsburg
review: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
